title: [caffe2] Build error: cannot find -lcudart
body_html:
Ubuntu 16.04, cuda 8.0, cudnn 7.1.3, caffe2 tag v0.4.0

error:
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc

-- 
-- ******** Summary ********
-- General:
--   CMake version         : 3.5.1
--   CMake command         : /usr/bin/cmake
--   Git version           : v0.4.0
--   System                : Linux
--   C++ compiler          : /usr/bin/c++
--   C++ compiler version  : 5.4.0
--   BLAS                  : Eigen
--   CXX flags             :  -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -DONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_c2 -O2 -fPIC -Wno-narrowing -Wno-invalid-partial-specialization
--   Build type            : Release
--   Compile definitions   : 
-- 
--   BUILD_BINARY          : ON
--   BUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF : ON
--     Link local protobuf : ON
--   BUILD_DOCS            : OFF
--   BUILD_PYTHON          : ON
--     Python version      : 3.5.2
--     Python includes     : /usr/include/python3.5m
--   BUILD_SHARED_LIBS     : ON
--   BUILD_TEST            : ON
--   USE_ATEN              : OFF
--   USE_ASAN              : OFF
--   USE_CUDA              : ON
--     CUDA version        : 8.0
--     CuDNN version       : 7.3.1
--     CUDA root directory : /usr/local/cuda
--     CUDA library        : /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/libcuda.so
--     CUDA NVRTC library  : /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
--     CUDA runtime library: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so
--     CUDA include path   : /usr/local/cuda/include
--     NVCC executable     : /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
--     CUDA host compiler  : /usr/bin/cc
--     USE_TENSORRT        : OFF
--   USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : 1
--   USE_FFMPEG            : OFF
--   USE_GFLAGS            : ON
--   USE_GLOG              : ON
--   USE_GLOO              : ON
--   USE_LEVELDB           : ON
--     LevelDB version     : 1.18
--     Snappy version      : 1.1.3
--   USE_LITE_PROTO        : OFF
--   USE_LMDB              : ON
--     LMDB version        : 0.9.17
--   USE_METAL             : OFF
--   USE_MKL               : 
--   USE_MOBILE_OPENGL     : OFF
--   USE_MPI               : OFF
--   USE_NCCL              : ON
--   USE_NERVANA_GPU       : OFF
--   USE_NNPACK            : ON
--   USE_OBSERVERS         : ON
--   USE_OPENCV            : ON
--     OpenCV version      : 2.4.9.1
--   USE_OPENMP            : OFF
--   USE_PROF              : OFF
--   USE_REDIS             : OFF
--   USE_ROCKSDB           : OFF
--   USE_ZMQ               : OFF
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/cgilab/pytorch/build

The error messages:

Scanning dependencies of target gtest
[  0%] Built target nccl_external
[  1%] Built target js_embed
...
...
...
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/pthreadpool_impl.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/proto_utils.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/signal_handler.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/cpuid.cc.o
In file included from /home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc:2:0:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h: In static member function ‘static T* caffe2::AllocAligned<T>::alloc(Args&& ...) [with Args = {caffe2::BlockingCounter*}; T = caffe2::Worker]’:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h:41:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     posix_memalign((void**)&p, kGEMMLOWPCacheLineSize, sizeof(T));
     ^
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wno-invalid-partial-specialization’
[ 63%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2.so
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:7976: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2.so] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3804: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

anyone can help me?

Ubuntu 16.04, cuda 8.0, cudnn 7.1.3, caffe2 tag v0.4.0
error:
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc
-- 
-- ******** Summary ********
-- General:
--   CMake version         : 3.5.1

--   C++ compiler version  : 5.4.0

--     CUDA NVRTC library  : /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
--     CUDA runtime library: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so

--     CUDA host compiler  : /usr/bin/cc
--     USE_TENSORRT        : OFF
--   USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : 1
--   USE_FFMPEG            : OFF
--   USE_GFLAGS            : ON

The error messages:
Scanning dependencies of target gtest
[  0%] Built target nccl_external
[  1%] Built target js_embed
...
...
...
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/pthreadpool_impl.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/proto_utils.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/signal_handler.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/cpuid.cc.o
In file included from /home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc:2:0:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h: In static member function ‘static T* caffe2::AllocAligned<T>::alloc(Args&& ...) [with Args = {caffe2::BlockingCounter*}; T = caffe2::Worker]’:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h:41:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     posix_memalign((void**)&p, kGEMMLOWPCacheLineSize, sizeof(T));
     ^
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wno-invalid-partial-specialization’
[ 63%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2.so
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:7976: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed

CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3804: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2


anyone can help me?
body:
Ubuntu 16.04, cuda 8.0, cudnn 7.1.3, caffe2 tag v0.4.0

error: 
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc


```
-- 
-- ******** Summary ********
-- General:
--   CMake version         : 3.5.1
--   CMake command         : /usr/bin/cmake
--   Git version           : v0.4.0
--   System                : Linux
--   C++ compiler          : /usr/bin/c++
--   C++ compiler version  : 5.4.0
--   BLAS                  : Eigen
--   CXX flags             :  -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -DONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_c2 -O2 -fPIC -Wno-narrowing -Wno-invalid-partial-specialization
--   Build type            : Release
--   Compile definitions   : 
-- 
--   BUILD_BINARY          : ON
--   BUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF : ON
--     Link local protobuf : ON
--   BUILD_DOCS            : OFF
--   BUILD_PYTHON          : ON
--     Python version      : 3.5.2
--     Python includes     : /usr/include/python3.5m
--   BUILD_SHARED_LIBS     : ON
--   BUILD_TEST            : ON
--   USE_ATEN              : OFF
--   USE_ASAN              : OFF
--   USE_CUDA              : ON
--     CUDA version        : 8.0
--     CuDNN version       : 7.3.1
--     CUDA root directory : /usr/local/cuda
--     CUDA library        : /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/libcuda.so
--     CUDA NVRTC library  : /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
--     CUDA runtime library: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so
--     CUDA include path   : /usr/local/cuda/include
--     NVCC executable     : /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
--     CUDA host compiler  : /usr/bin/cc
--     USE_TENSORRT        : OFF
--   USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : 1
--   USE_FFMPEG            : OFF
--   USE_GFLAGS            : ON
--   USE_GLOG              : ON
--   USE_GLOO              : ON
--   USE_LEVELDB           : ON
--     LevelDB version     : 1.18
--     Snappy version      : 1.1.3
--   USE_LITE_PROTO        : OFF
--   USE_LMDB              : ON
--     LMDB version        : 0.9.17
--   USE_METAL             : OFF
--   USE_MKL               : 
--   USE_MOBILE_OPENGL     : OFF
--   USE_MPI               : OFF
--   USE_NCCL              : ON
--   USE_NERVANA_GPU       : OFF
--   USE_NNPACK            : ON
--   USE_OBSERVERS         : ON
--   USE_OPENCV            : ON
--     OpenCV version      : 2.4.9.1
--   USE_OPENMP            : OFF
--   USE_PROF              : OFF
--   USE_REDIS             : OFF
--   USE_ROCKSDB           : OFF
--   USE_ZMQ               : OFF
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/cgilab/pytorch/build
```


The error messages:

```
Scanning dependencies of target gtest
[  0%] Built target nccl_external
[  1%] Built target js_embed
...
...
...
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/pthreadpool_impl.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/proto_utils.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/signal_handler.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/cpuid.cc.o
In file included from /home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc:2:0:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h: In static member function ‘static T* caffe2::AllocAligned<T>::alloc(Args&& ...) [with Args = {caffe2::BlockingCounter*}; T = caffe2::Worker]’:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h:41:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     posix_memalign((void**)&p, kGEMMLOWPCacheLineSize, sizeof(T));
     ^
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wno-invalid-partial-specialization’
[ 63%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2.so
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:7976: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2.so] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3804: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

```

anyone can help me?
